channel.title: Help! Getting an error when trying to run my webclient!
channel.description:
Okay, so I'm just now figuring out how to make a webclient for my server. All was running somewhat smoothly, I ran into some errors but a quick trip to the search bar solved them, except now there's a problem that I just can't find a solution to! Whenever I try to run my webclient's JAR file, I get an error telling me this:
[code]Sorry, an error has occured whilst loading [server's name here] To fix this try the following (in order): 1:Try closing ALL of your web-browser windows, and reloading 2:Try clearing your web browser's cache from tools>internet options 3:Try using a different game world 4:Try rebooting your computer 5:Try selecting a different version of Java from the play game menu[/code]
I've done all possible previously mentioned steps. Someone please help!

item.title: Help! Getting an error when trying to run my webclient!
item.dc:creator: @General_Stevie General Stevie
item.description:
@General_Stevie wrote:

Sorry, I’m kind of new if you hadn’t noticed, all I need is a little help.

EDIT:
Lol, and erm… you’re welcome I guess

Read full topic
item.source: Help! Getting an error when trying to run my webclient!

item.title: Help! Getting an error when trying to run my webclient!
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

Everything to do with a web client goes in Client Help.

@EDIT@

I thank you for using the search bar though.

Read full topic
